alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Tehama, north central Glenn and south central Shasta Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 312 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Whiskeytown to 7 miles west of Blossom to near Rancho Tehama Reserve to Fruto. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail with significant small hail accumulation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redding, Red Bluff, Orland, Shasta Dam, Elk Creek, Shasta Lake, Anderson, Central Valley, Whiskeytown, Stoney Gorge Reservoir, Central Valley Cdp, Ono, Henleyville, Paskenta, Fruto, Chrome, Mountain Gate, Newville, Rosewood and Keswick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
